entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 24.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then southeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
